problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are on the edges AB and AC respectively, and DE ∥ BC, if \frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{N_0}{N_1},AC=N_2, then the length of AE is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查平行线分线段成比例定理,正确运用定理、找准对应关系是解题的关键．
